title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Increasing Student Engagement and Sense of Belonging for Online Math Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can build a sense of community with peer learners through online discussions and collaborative activities.
Learners can maintain psychological stability and a sense of belonging during the learning process through regular instructor feedback and support.

Learners actively participate in real-time classes by joining ≥2 weekly polls, speaking ≥1 time in small-group discussions, and fulfilling ≥4/5 criteria in interactive activity engagement evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
